comments.body: I think you are the first to turn this around so that `withContext` is the default thing to do. Great!

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +91,95 @@    Flow.fromGraph(new impl.AmqpAsyncUnorderedFlowStage(settings))

  private def asFlowWithoutContext(flow: Flow[(WriteMessage, NotUsed), (WriteResult, NotUsed), Future[Done]]) =
    Flow[WriteMessage]
      .map(message => (message, NotUsed))
